com.facebook.buck.rules.keys

Interface RuleKeyCache<V>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TrackedRuleKeyCache

    public interface RuleKeyCache<V>
    Interface for caches for rule keys.

      • get

        @Nullable
V get(BuildRule rule)
        Returns:
        the rule key value for the given rule, or null if it is not cached..
